title: someone help me
body:
Hey guys I live in Australia and I have a account on na I recently brought a prepaid card and when I try redeem it I keep getting the region specific error I have tryed redeeming it in the us store and Aus store and nothing work
this is the error message the i get when i try redeem RP codes are region specific, and this code is invalid for your current region. Please contact us for more information at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us 
i need help

replies.body: Wait, so are you saying you brought a card from Australia, tried to redeem it on the NA server first, and then tried to redeem it on the OCE server, and it failed both times?
